en-GB.summary: Solves Anagrams the user provides to Alexa
en-GB.name: Anagram Solver
en-GB.description:
The user provides Alexa with an anagram and the alexa skill accesses an anagram solver API endpoint and returns the result to the user, which may be a list of possible words, one word or no words if it wasn't able to solve the anagram.

The user can also ask alexa to repeat solution, and it will replay the solution. However, you must have given it a anagram to solve before you can use repeat solution.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
1. Alexa Anagram Solver
2. solve r i e e v w
3. repeat solution
